field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the failure of a government department to respond to PA requests within the legislated time frame

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the improper use and disclosure of an individual's personal information in contravention of sections 7 and 8 of the PA

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint in which an individual was not provided with his/her personal information in the official language of his/her choice Langue

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte dans laquelle un individu n'a pas reçu ses renseignements personnels dans la langue officielle de son choix

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint in which an individual complains that his information is not accurate and that the personal information should be corrected or notated

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the retaining or disposal of an individual's personal information held by a federal government institution

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte concernant la conservation ou le retrait des renseignements personnels d'un individu détenus par une institution fédérale

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the application of fees to Privacy Act requests. There are no fees required to submit or process PA requests

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: 5(3) of the Act indicates that an organization may collect, use, or disclose personal information only for purposes that a reasonable person would consider appropriate in the circumstances

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: 5(3) de la Loi indique que l'organisation ne peut receuillir, utiliser ou comminquer des resnseignements personnels qu'a des finds qu'une personne raisonnable estimaerait acceptables dans les circonstances

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning any other PA issue not described elsewhere on this list

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte concernant tout autre enjeu relatif à la LPRP non décrit ailleurs dans cette liste

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint in which an individual does not receive a response to his/her correction request from the department within 30 days

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte dans laquelle un individu n'a pas reçu de réponse dans les 30 jours à sa demande de correction auprès du ministère

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: The purposes for which personal information is collected shall be identified by the organization at or before the time the information is collected.

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Les fins auxquelles des renseignements personnels sont recueillis doivent etre determinees par l'organisation avant la collecte ou au moment de celle-ci

field.name: opc_namefrench
field.value: PIPEDA - Determination des fins de la collecte des renseignements personnels

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the collection of an individual's personal information

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte concernant la collecte des renseignements personnels d'un individu

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: Complaints that an employer has taken adverse action towards an employee because the employee disclosed to the Commissioner that the employer contravened or intended to contravene PIPEDA

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Un employé qui croit avoir fait l’objet de représailles de la part de son employeur peut présenter la question devant la commissaire.

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the extension of PA responses beyond the 30 day legislated time frame

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte au sujet de la prorogation de réponses en vertu de la LPRP au-delà des 30 jours prescrits par la Loi

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the content of the federal government publication InfoSource which lists the Personal Information Banks of each federal government department. This includes the failure by departments to publish the existence of its personal information

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte au sujet du contenu de la publication gouvernementale Info Source, qui énumère les fichiers de renseignements personnels de chaque ministère fédéral. Inclut le défaut d'un ministère d'avoir fait part de ses fichiers de renseignements personnels

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: A complaint concerning the collection of an individual???s personal information

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Plainte concernant tout autre enjeu relatif à la LPRP non décrit ailleurs dans cette liste

field.name: opc_descriptionenglish
field.value: Denial of access in response to formal Privacy Act complaint test if update still works

field.name: opc_descriptionfrench
field.value: Accès refusé en réponse à une plainte formelle en vertu de la LPRP

field.name: description
field.value: This queue is used to triage new complaints.

field.name: description
field.value: This queue is used to display the backlog of complaints.

field.name: description
field.value: This queue is used to indicate that a complaint is being reviewed.
